CodeList.Name: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology Self-Report Version Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology Self-Report Version test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Aches and pains.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Concentration/decision making.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Constipation/diarrhea.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Decreased appetite.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Energy level.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Falling asleep.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Feeling anxious or tense.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Feeling irritable.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Feeling restless.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Feeling sad.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Feeling slowed down.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: General interest.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Increased appetite.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Interest in sex.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Interpersonal sensitivity.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Leaden paralysis/physical energy.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - Leaden Paralysis or Physical Energy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Is your mood variation attributed to the environment?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - Mood Variation Attributed to Environment

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: IDSR1-Mood in Relation to Time of Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: IDSR1-Mood in Relation to Time of Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Mood in relation to the time of day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - Mood in Relation to the Time of Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Is your mood typically worse in the morning, afternoon or night?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - Mood Worse in Morning, Afternoon, or Night

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Other bodily symptoms.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Panic/phobic symptoms.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Capacity for pleasure or enjoyment (excluding sex).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - Capacity for Pleasure or Enjoyment

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: The quality of your mood.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - The Quality of Your Mood

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Score.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Sleep during the night.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Sleeping too much.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Thoughts of death or suicide.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - Thoughts of Death or Suicide

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: View of my future.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: View of myself.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Waking up too early.
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: within the last two weeks: Weight (decrease).
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: within the last two weeks: Weight (increase).
Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology - Self-Report - Please circle the one response to each item that best describes you for the past seven days: Response of your mood to good or desired events.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IDS-SR - Response of Your Mood to Good or Desired Events

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology Self-Report Version Questionnaire Test Name
